root: ^It is the 4th year of Cator's Conquest. Many have fallen beneath the banner of the Kytosi Empire.
^The latest inevitable casuality of Kytosi aggression is the city-state of Vykengaard.
^While their fierce warrior-priests have fought valiantly, the Imperial 3rd legion is days away from launching a siege to end their resistance.
^But Cator is not a patient woman. They have dispatched Their personal agents to enter the city and shatter any resistance from the inside.
^Well, rook, what's it look like down there.
^Refugees are flooding in from the surrounding farmlands. It won't be a problem to slip in unnoticed, Captain.
^The 4th legion is just a day's march away, right? With that many mouths to feed and the state of those walls... they won't last a week.
^Listen up, rook. We're agents of the Kytosi Empire, Cator's own will.
^We could let the army march in and burn the city to ground, but then Cator's ruling over ashes. And They want an empire.
^We're here to take the city as intact as they'll let us. We do our job right, and the 4th just waltzes to keep the peace.
^One more thing, we're in the field. No need for formalities, just call me Prisca, rook.
^Does that mean you'll start calling me Caius?
^Ha, maybe if I decide you've been useful. You're still green, rook.
^Very well, let's go over the targets.

c-0: ^The city has a church devoted to some pagan god.
c-1: ^Zaar Vyk I has a statue in the city square.
c-2: ^Some minor noble is rallying the defense of the city.
